DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy , safety tolerability prophylactic ( preventative ) treatment BOTOX® ( onabotulinumtoxinA ) compare topiramate adult chronic migraine .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study BOTOX® Compared Topiramate Prevention Chronic Migraine Adults
DOC.criteria: History chronic migraine More 15 headache day 28 day period ( headache last 4 hour and/or require treatment prescription medication ) . Taking opioidcontaining product acute headache treatment 8 day 28day period Previous treatment botulinum toxin serotype reason Previous treatment topiramate On ketogenic diet ( high fat , low carbohydrate ) History acute myopia increase intraocular pressure Diagnosis myasthenia gravis , EatonLambert syndrome , amyotrophic lateral sclerosis significant disease might interfere neuromuscular function Acupuncture , transcutaneous electrical stimulation ( TENS ) , cranial traction , dental splint headache , injection anesthetics/steroids 4 week prior screen .
